name: Roll-o Ball-o
description:
Swipe your screen to tilt your ball down each platform and reach the goal at the bottom!
Roll-o Ball-o is a fun platform game where the aim is to get your ball into the hole, but watch out, make sure you don't fall off the edge of your platform otherwise it's game over!

Roll-o Ball-o features:
- Simple and easy gameplay
- Addictive levels
- Realistic physics
- Increasingly challenging levels
